name: Backgammon Game Tray
description: The KIFU PARIS Backgammon Game Tray is the ultimate luxury game. Accented with a mixture of shagreen, pen shell and bronze-patina brass this piece comes with all game parts in a velvet pouch. Available in a light or dark color way. Currently made to order 5-6 weeks. Handmade. Antique Natural Shagreen surface, bronze-patina brass legs. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines
